about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I have been working in the programming market since 2017 and have over 2 years of experience with remote work. I hold a bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering from UNIFESSPA (Federal University of South and Southeast of Par치).
about.descriptionLine1: With over 5 years of experience in the software development market, I work with JavaScript in applications on the front-end, back-end, and mobile. The area in which I have the most experience is front-end development using React.js, sometimes alongside Next.js.
about.descriptionLine2: I have been enhancing my work by developing REST APIs using Node.js, and whenever possible, I get involved in building mobile applications within the projects at my company, Ctech.
about.descriptionLine3: I have participated in the creation of various websites and their management systems, such as Eventozz and cont치bilhub.
about.descriptionLine4: I have over two years of experience with remote work, consistently using tools such as Trello, Jira, and Git.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: React and Node are the technologies I use most in my day-to-day work, but I also have experience with various others.
